In-class Exercise 1

Spatial Weights

Loading Packages

This exercise uses sf to import geospatial datasets. tidyverse is for manipulating aspatial data. spdep is used to generate spatial weightages and tmap is used to plot maps.

Importing and Preparing Data

This dataset contains the administrative boundaries of the Hunan province in China.

hunan <- st_read(dsn="data/geospatial",
                 layer="Hunan")
Reading layer `Hunan' from data source 
  `D:\lins-92\ISSS624\In-class_EX01\data\geospatial' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'

Bounding box:  xmin: 108.7831 ymin: 24.6342 xmax: 114.2544 ymax: 30.12812
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84

Now let’s load the attribute data. This dataset contains some economic indicators of cities in the Hunan province.

econ <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_2012.csv")

ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
